title: BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop for Hard Floors and Area Rugs, Black, 2554A
descriptions:
BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All-in-One Wet-Dry Vacuum and Mop, Black, 2554A

Clean smarter and faster with the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max, the all-in-one wet-dry vacuum and mop designed to tackle everyday messes on hard floors and area rugs—without the cord. Powered by a 36V lithium-ion battery for up to 30 minutes of cordless cleaning, it vacuums and washes in one step, then refreshes itself with a built-in self-cleaning cycle.

Key features:
- All-in-one vacuum and mop: Simultaneously pick up debris and wash floors for a deeper, time-saving clean.
- Cordless convenience: 36V lithium-ion battery delivers up to 30 minutes of run time for room-to-room cleaning.
- Multi-surface performance: Safely cleans tile, sealed wood, laminate, linoleum, rubber floor mats, pressed wood floors, and refreshes area rugs.
- Rotating brush system: Lifts stuck-on dirt while handling both wet and dry messes.
- Improved edge cleaning: Better reach along baseboards and corners.
- Two-tank technology: Keeps clean water and formula separate from dirty water for a consistently fresh clean (28 oz clean water tank; 18.6 oz dirt tank).
- Smart control and insights: Wi-Fi enabled and compatible with the BISSELL Connect app for maintenance alerts, usage tips, and formula reminders.
- Maneuverable design: 10.5-inch cleaning path, swivel head, and integrated carry handle for easy handling and storage.
- Self-cleaning cycle: Flushes brush roll and internal pathways to reduce buildup and maintain performance.

What’s in the box:
- BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max (Model 2554A, Black)
- 2 Multi-Surface Trial Formulas
- 2 Hard Floor Sanitize Trial Formulas
- 2 Multi-Surface Brush Rolls

Why you’ll love it:
- True multi-surface versatility for whole-home cleaning.
- Less time switching tools; more time enjoying clean floors.
- Thoughtful maintenance features extend life and performance.

Give back while you clean:
Every purchase supports BISSELL Pet Foundation, helping save homeless pets.

Specifications:
- Brand/Model: BISSELL 2554A
- Functions: Vacuums and washes
- Cleaning path width: 10.5 inches
- Battery: 36V Lithium-Ion, up to 30 minutes
- Tanks: 28 oz clean water; 18.6 oz dirt tank
- Connectivity: Wi-Fi, BISSELL Connect app
- Included technologies: Rotating brush, two-tank system, improved edge cleaning, self-cleaning cycle
- Color: Black

Perfect for busy homes, pet families, and anyone who wants a quick, complete clean on multiple floor types—without the cord.
